title: Innovating Remote Education in the COVID-19 Era: Exploring Science Pedagogy Through Instagram Narrative Reflection

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Analysis of reflective practice cases using Instagram in remote education environments and focus on innovation in science teaching methodologies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of COVID-19 on elementary science education from a cultural perspective.
Learners systematically reflect on and share their teaching practicum experiences using Instagram narrative techniques.
Learners can propose effective experimental design plans for remote education environments through Project-Based Learning (PBL).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
